title: Fresh Mint Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 FRESH MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Fresh Mint nicotine pouches by 77 is a strong nicotine pouch tasting of refreshing mint. A wonderful choice after a cup of coffee to freshen up your breath, or if you simply love the taste of crisp mint. View all 77 Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 13MG Per Pouch 8MG Per Gram | 5,2MG Per Pouch Fresh Mint flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT MINT FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The alluring and cooling flavour of the fresh mint provides an unbeatable, refreshing nicotine experience and invigorating taste, helping you leave cigarettes behind for good. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
